channel.title: [REQUEST] for all servers - list of dupes
channel.description: can anyone gimme a list of all dupes you know, for any type of server, so that people can try to find a fix?

item.title: [REQUEST] for all servers - list of dupes
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Packet manipulating while trading/dueling/invoninvitem/invonobj/anything.

Most RS2 servers have hundreds of dupes, because retarded owners have no idea how to fix prevent them, which is simply just doing checks like if the player has item, or if affected player is the current player.

Read full topic
item.source: [REQUEST] for all servers - list of dupes

item.title: [REQUEST] for all servers - list of dupes
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Why is this in Client Hacking?

  1. Trade dupe, quickly clicking accept/decline.
  2. Trade dupe, walking on the minimap to a certain distance.
  3. Trade dupe, logging out during the trading process.
  4. Trade dupe, doing the above except in a certain order.
  5. Thereâ€™s a certain dupe involving staves.

Read full topic
